divs: sighting detailsi saw a ufo last night and this guy on the internet said it was a stupid light and his site is [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg]. it looked like a big triangle with lights on every corner and a red light in the middle. i am not lying and that site says that people who see a ufo are lying about it.
